org.mini2Dx.core.engine.interpolator

Interface FloatInterpolator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscreteFloatInterpolator, LinearFloatInterpolator

    public interface FloatInterpolator
    The interpolator function for floats. By using primitive values directly, we avoid any unnecessary allocation of Floats during auto-boxing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float interpolate(float initialValue, float currentValue, float alpha)
      The interpolation algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • interpolate

        float interpolate(float initialValue,
                  float currentValue,
                  float alpha)
        The interpolation algorithm. This takes the initial value, the current value, and the ratio of initial value to current value. The result is then returned for use.
        Parameters:
        initialValue - the initial value
        currentValue - the current value
        alpha - a value between 0.0f to 1.0f. When alpha is 0.0f, the value should always be the initial value. When alpha is at 1.0f, the value should always be the current value.
